lead_paragraph: Sri Lankan Kusal Mendis struck a majestic maiden test century on day three of the first test against Australia to leave the bowler-dominated contest evenly poised at Pallekele on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Magnificent Mendis Revives Sri Lanka With Maiden Ton
headline.main: Magnificent Mendis Revives Sri Lanka With Maiden Ton

snippet: Sri Lankan Kusal Mendis struck a majestic maiden test century on day three of the first test against Australia to leave the bowler-dominated contest evenly poised at Pallekele on Thursday....
